lyrics:
Greek
Greek script
Translation



Greek
Edo, ston trito planiti̱
Pote den svisan oi foties
Pos moiazei me trelo komiti
Gemato me pyrinikes
Ton ilio kaname echthro mas
Pantou pli̱gosame ti gi
Molyname ton ourano mas
Kai richnei oxini vrochi
Edo planitis gi, edo planitis gi
SOS, SOS, SOS
Edo planitis gi, edo planitis gi
SOS, SOS, SOS
Trigyro ta poulia pethainoun
Ta psaria vgainoun sti steria
Pantou oi anthropoi so̱painoun
Den xeroun ti na kanoun pia
Edo planitis gi, edo planitis gi
SOS, SOS, SOS
Edo planitis gi, edo planitis gi
SOS, SOS, SOS
Edo planitis gi, edo planitis gi
SOS, SOS, SOS
SOS
